text:
Going back to June 2020 we’ve been calling on an equitable distribution plan for the #COVID19 #vaccine in #NYC. Data released today of those who have been #vaccinated so far is yet another injustice to our communities. #NeverForget 

White: 48%
Black: 15%
Latino: 15%
Asian: 11% https://t.co/4XApFRo8ec
